name: The Apartment Network in Quebec
tag_list: furnished-apartments, short-term-rental, student-housing, student-accommodation, short-term-rent, immigration-to-quebec, corporate-rental, executive-rental, relocation-services, relocating, apartment-search, short-term-apartment, real-estate-market, real-
overview:
The Apartment Network in Quebec (Réseau Appartements et Gîtes au Québec (RAGQ)) is in short term rental of furnished apartments in Montreal with more than 600 fully furnished apartments available.

The Apartment Network in Quebec offers student housing to foreign students. For immigration to Quebec, it provides short term rent. It welcomes business people in a corporate rental. Relocated persons or families can use its relocation services. There are also short term apartments for people in an emergency situation (divorce, fire, flooding, medical treatments in Montreal, etc.).

The Apartment Network in Quebec works closely with Immo-Invest Quebec, a Real Estate Agency. Immo-Invest Quebec guides its clients every step of the way from the purchase of a property right up to the actual rental. Its agents are skilled at establishing, for each property, the income that can be derived from a furnished rental. To know more: http://www.ragq.com/reat-estate-agency

The Apartment Network in Quebec offers also a Property Management Services. It has acquired considerable expertise in the full service management of apartments and buildings in the Greater Montreal area whether they be furnished, non-furnished or even semi-furnished. To know more: http://www.ragq.com/property-management-services

Apartment owners are welcome to contact The Apartment Network in Quebec to inquire about renting furnished. To know more: http://www.ragq.com/rent-it-furnished Investors are also welcome to inquire about real estate investment in the Greater Montreal and its furnished rental by the RAGQ. To know more: http://www.ragq.com/real-estate-investment
